com.github.breadmoirai.breadbot.framework.annotation.parameter

Annotation Type Author


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=PARAMETER)
 @Inherited
public @interface Author
    This should only be used on parameters of type Member and User. This parameter has a field which if set to true, indicates that the parameter should only be set to the author if a member is not mentioned in the command.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean unlessMention
      by default false

    • Element Detail

      • unlessMention

        public abstract boolean unlessMention
        by default false
        Returns:
        booleans
        Default:
        false
